channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: イスラエルのジャーナリストや報道関係者の中には、イスラエルとハマスの戦争について反対意見を述べることが、以前の紛争よりもさらに難しくなっていると言う者もいる（Emma Goldberg/New York Times）。
item.description:
Emma Goldberg / New York Times:
Some Israeli journalists and press advocates say that airing dissenting opinions on the Israel-Hamas war has become even more fraught than in prior conflicts  —  Airing criticism of the country's response has become even more fraught than in previous conflicts, some journalists and press advocates said.

item.title: イスラエルとハマスの戦争で、10月20日現在、少なくとも22人のジャーナリストが殺害された（パレスチナ人18人、イスラエル人3人、レバノン人1人）。
item.description:
Kathy Jones / Committee to Protect Journalists:
At least 22 journalists have been killed in the Israel-Hamas war as of October 20: 18 Palestinian, 3 Israeli, and 1 Lebanese; 3 are reported missing or detained  —  The Israel-Gaza conflict has taken a severe toll on journalists since Hamas launched its unprecedented attack against Israel …

item.title: 調査：10月7日から10日にかけて、イーロン・マスクが宣伝した、影響力はあるが信頼性の低い7つのXアカウントが、Xの英語版イスラエル・ハマース戦争ニュースを独占した（Brandy Zadrozny/NBC News）
item.description:
Brandy Zadrozny / NBC News:
Research: seven influential but unreliable X accounts, some promoted by Elon Musk, dominated English-language Israel-Hamas war news on X from October 7 to 10  —  The University of Washington's Center for an Informed Public said that the most popular posts about the crisis revealed how news on the platform is …

item.title: WGAWのメレディス・スティーム会長は、「コンセンサスが得られない」と判断した理事会がイスラエルとハマスの戦争について公にコメントしないことを会員に伝えた（Dominic Patten/Deadline）
item.description:
Dominic Patten / Deadline:
WGAW President Meredith Stiehm tells members that the board of directors won't comment publicly on the Israel-Hamas war, after finding “consensus out of reach”  —  - Ryan Reynolds, Your Kid's No Scab; Turns Out SAG-AFTRA's Studio Halloween Costume Ban Is Adults Only

item.title: SAG-AFTRAとAMPTPが10月24日にSAG-AFTRAプラザで交渉再開を計画、AMPTP加盟社から数名の幹部が出席予定（締め切り）
item.description:
Deadline:
SAG-AFTRA and the AMPTP plan to return to negotiations on October 24 at SAG-AFTRA Plaza; several executives from AMPTP member companies plan to be in attendance  —  After over a week of silence, the actors union and the AMPTP are set to return to negotiations on Tuesday, Oct. 24.

item.title: 情報筋G/OメディアはJezebelを買い手候補のBDG、Factz、Dear Mediaに売り込み中、フェミニストサイトはG/Oの男性偏重のポートフォリオの中では異端児だとしている（Axios）。
item.description:
Axios:
Sources: G/O Media is shopping Jezebel to potential buyers BDG, Factz, and Dear Media, saying the feminist site is an outlier in G/O's male-skewing portfolio  —  The owner of Jezebel is shopping the trailblazing website to potential buyers, sources tell Axios.

item.title: SAG-AFTRAのフラン・ドレッシャー会長は、ジョージ・クルーニーの提案をやんわりとはねつけ、「圧力に屈しない」よう会員に呼びかけ、派閥の溝を埋めようとしている（Gene Maddaus/Variety）
item.description:
Gene Maddaus / Variety:
SAG-AFTRA President Fran Drescher works to bridge factional divides, gently rebuffing George Clooney's proposals, and urges members not to “succumb to pressure”  —  “Member unity will be my greatest legacy,” she promised in her campaign statement this summer, and she sought reelection.

item.title: 情報筋：WGAの理事会はイスラエルとハマスの戦争への対応で意見が分かれており、一部の活動家メンバーが同国を支持する声明に反対することを懸念している（Lesley Goldberg/The Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Lesley Goldberg / The Hollywood Reporter:
Sources: the WGA's board is divided on how to respond to the Israel-Hamas war, worried that some activist members will oppose a statement supporting the country  —  Multiple sources say the WGA's board remains divided on how to respond after Hamas' attack on Oct. 7, worried …

item.title: Twitch、クリエイターにあらゆるライブストリーミングサービスでの同時配信を許可（ただし注意事項あり）、「サービス外行為」の取り締まりリストにDoxingとSwattingを追加（Jay Peters/The Verge
item.description:
Jay Peters / The Verge:
Twitch now lets creators simulcast across any live streaming service, with caveats, and adds doxxing and swatting to its Off-Service Conduct enforcement list  —  Previously, streamers could simulcast on mobile platforms like TikTok and Instagram, but as of Friday, Twitch is significantly broadening …

item.title: 録音：クレムリンとつながりのある大物がフォーブスを買収したと発言、8億ドルの取引を主導したオースティン・ラッセルは、CFIUSが調査中との情報筋の話として、外国人の関与を否定（ワシントン・ポスト紙）
item.description:
Washington Post:
Recordings: a Kremlin-tied tycoon said he bought Forbes; the $800M deal lead, Austin Russell, denies foreign involvement, as sources say CFIUS is investigating  —  Austin Russell, the American tech founder leading the deal, says there is no Russian involvement

item.title: ガザにいる数少ないジャーナリストたちは、食事、水分補給、住居、安全を確保しながら戦争を報道しようとしている。10月7日以来、ジャーナリストたちはガザに入ることができない（David Bauder/Associated Press）
item.description:
David Bauder / Associated Press:
The few journalists in Gaza try to report on the war while staying fed, hydrated, housed, and safe; journalists have been unable to enter Gaza since October 7  —  A limited number of journalists in Gaza are trying to report on the war with Israel while facing the same problems …

item.title: バイデン大統領が10月19日に行ったイスラエルとウクライナへの援助を求める演説の視聴者数は、Fox News、MSNBC、CNN、アメリカの6つの放送ネットワークで平均2212万人だった（Rick Porter/Hollywood Reporter）。
item.description:
Rick Porter / Hollywood Reporter:
President Biden's address seeking aid for Israel and Ukraine on October 19 averaged 22.12M viewers across Fox News, MSNBC, CNN, and six US broadcast networks  —  ABC draws the largest share of viewers for the speech, while Fox News tops cable outlets.

item.title: イスラエルとハマスの戦争で殺害された少なくとも22人のパレスチナ人、イスラエル人、レバノン人ジャーナリストのうち6人の生死を詳しく見る（Washington Post紙）
item.description:
Washington Post:
A closer look at the lives and deaths of six of at least 22 Palestinian, Israeli, and Lebanese journalists who have been killed during the Israel-Hamas war  —  At least 19 journalists have been killed in the Israel-Gaza war since Oct. 7, the Committee to Protect Journalists said this week.

item.title: 情報源：ワシントンDCの2人の議員が、住民が地元の報道機関を支援するために使えるバウチャーに年間1,100万ドルを割り当てる法案を提出する予定（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
Sources: two Washington, DC, council members plan to introduce a bill allocating $11M/year for vouchers that residents could use to support local news outlets  —  D.C. council members plan to introduce a first-of-its-kind bill that would issue government-funded vouchers to city residents …

item.title: BBCのイスラエルとハマスの戦争報道が批判される中、ティム・デイビーBBC局長は10月25日、英国保守党議員の私的会合で講演する予定だ（Kevin Schofield/HuffPost）
item.description:
Kevin Schofield / HuffPost:
BBC Director General Tim Davie is set to speak on October 25 at a private meeting of UK Conservative MPs, amid criticism of the BBC's Israel-Hamas war reporting  —  The 1922 Committee appearance comes amid criticism of the corporation for refusing to call Hamas terrorists.
